data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Hiroshima get the game underway.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Free kick in a good position for Hiroshima!
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Kashiwa.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroshima takes a corner from the right.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Kashiwa at EDION Stadium.
Kashiwa take a 0-1 lead thanks to Michael Olunga.
That's a fine assist from Hiroto Goya.
In the minute 18, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroshima are caught offside.
Kashiwa are coming forward and Michael Olunga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 24, Hiroshima's Yuya Asano misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Hiroshima pushes forward through Hayao Kawabe, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 30, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 33, Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroshima drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Hiroshima.
The first-half has ended.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Kashiwa kick-off.
In the minute 47, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Hiroshima.
Free kick Hiroshima.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Kashiwa at EDION Stadium.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroshima are whistled for offside.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 54, Hiroshima are pushing forward but Yusuke Chajima's finish is wide of the goal.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Ataru Esaka of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroshima takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 56, Can Kashiwa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
The home team replace Kodai Dohi with Toshihiro Aoyama.
Douglas Vieira is replacing Kosei Shibasaki for the home team.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Kashiwa at EDION Stadium.
Ataru Esaka of Kashiwa is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Yoshifumi Kashiwa is on a sub for Yuya Asano for Hiroshima.
Hiroshima make their fourth substitution with Hiroya Matsumoto replacing Yusuke Chajima.
In the minute 68, The away team replace Hidekazu Otani with Yusuke Kobayashi.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hiroshima are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 71, Hiroshima takes a corner from the left.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Hiroshima.
Kashiwa make their second substitution with Hayato Nakama replacing Ataru Esaka.
In the minute 77, Kashiwa drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Tomoya Fujii is on a sub for Shunki Higashi for Hiroshima.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Mao Hosoya is replacing Hiroto Goya for the away team.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 89, Kashiwa are caught offside.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Throw-in for Kashiwa at EDION Stadium.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
